Koga Shuko/Unitron/Serpentor/Anubis/Hades:




Koga Shuko waited as Unitron, Serpentor, Anubis and Hades exited the base.  
"Yes, mercenaries, come with us.  We'll double your pay.  But first we must 
wait for the rest of my forces to group up."
